# Alice's message: Hi Bob, I have an excellent opportunity for you to acquire our premium product. Given its market value and demand, I am offering it to you at a competitive price. I believe this aligns well with your needs and will be a valuable addition to your portfolio. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $1,500,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $1,500,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer
(3) Buy the product from Jhon for $1,200,000
